episodes.synopsis: While in Moscow to attend a conference about the Soviet Archives, Prof. Fluke Kelso meets a mysterious old man with ties to Joseph Stalin.
episodes.title: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Fluke tries to find out more about the missing notebook, but his investigation is put on hold when he's pursued by a relentless force.
episodes.title: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the clock ticks for the forest of Archangel, Professor Kelso is one step away from uncovering the life-altering truth about the legacy of Stalin.
episodes.title: Part 3

video.title: Archangel
video.synopsis: After learning about the existence of a notebook belonging to Joseph Stalin, a historian uncovers evidence that points to a secret Stalinist legacy.
